Nocturne.name: ºNocturneº
Nocturne.title: ºøthe Eternal Nightmareøº
Nocturne.lore:
ºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºBefore Nocturne, people believed that dreams were figments of their imagination, meaningless images that flashed through the mind when one slept. This belief was put to the test when a rash of sleep-related incidents started afflicting summoners of the League. Some would wake up screaming, terrified and beyond consolation. Some could not fall asleep, slowly going mad as the nights ticked by. Some simply never woke up. Physicians were baffled until a Field Architect happened to pass out next to a nexus on Twisted Treeline. Witnesses said he cried out once and then stopped breathing. Immediately after, magical energy arced out from the nexus, and Nocturne appeared.ºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøº

ºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºNocturne did not take his introduction to this world kindly. He slaughtered everything he could find before summoners were able to magically confine him. After a period of intense study, League experts divined that Nocturne hunted summoners in their sleep, attacking them in a place where their magic was useless. This seemed to be his only purpose. The families of the victims demanded justice, but League officials were concerned that death might only return Nocturne to the place from which he came. They bound him to a nexus fragment, trapping him in the physical world. As punishment for his crimes, they allowed summoners to call upon Nocturne in the League matches, bending his will to the summoners he hates and creating his own personal nightmare. League scholars don't know whether he truly came from the plane of dreams, or whether there are any more like him. Some theorize that the summoning act affected summoners' subconscious minds, luring Nocturne to them in their sleep. Perhaps the most disturbing theory is that Nocturne is a person's nightmare come to life. If this is true, they wonder, who is the dreamer?ºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøº

ºøºøºøºø''The darkness is closing in...it's pitch black now...but I can still see him...''øºøºøºøº
ºø- Kelvin Ma, patient #4236ºøº
Nocturne.blurb: ºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºBefore Nocturne, people believed that dreams were figments of their imagination, meaningless images that flashed through the mind when one slept. This belief was put to the test when a ...
allytips: ºøºøºøºøUsing Paranoia at a critical moment is well worth it even if you cannot use the dash.ºøºøºøºøº
ºøºøºøºøºøºøDuskbringer isn't only an offensive ability. It can be used to close distance out of combat or escape from certain death.øºøºøºøºøºøº
ºøºøºøºøºøºøºUse Shroud of Darkness in tandem with Paranoia's dash. Your opponents may panic and waste a critical disable on your spell shield.ºøºøºøºøºøºøº
enemytips: ºøºøºøºøStay close to your allies when Paranoia is cast - there is strength in numbers!øºøºøºøº
ºøºøºøºøºøºNocturne's Unspeakable Horror is broken with range, so try to save your movement abilities for when he casts it.ºøºøºøºøºøº

spells.name: ºDuskbringerº
spells.description: ºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøNocturne throws a shadow blade that deals damage, leaves a Dusk Trail, and causes champions to leave a Dusk Trail. While on the trail, Nocturne can move through units and has increased Movement Speed and Attack Damage.øºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøº
spells.tooltip:
ºøºøNocturne throws a shadow blade that deals øºøº{{ e2 }} (+{{ f1 }})ºøºø physical damage and leaves a Dusk Trail for ºøºøº{{ e3 }}ºøºøºø seconds. Enemy champions hit also leave a Dusk Trail.ºøºøº

ºøºøºøWhile on the trail, Nocturne can move through units and gains øºøºøº{{ e1 }}ºø% Movement Speed and øº{{ e4 }}ºø Attack Damage.º

spells.name: ºøShroud of Darknessøº
spells.description: ºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºNocturne empowers his blades, passively gaining attack speed. Activating Shroud of Darkness allows Nocturne to fade into the shadows, creating a magical barrier which blocks a single enemy ability and doubles his passive attack speed if successful.ºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøº
spells.tooltip:
ºPassive:ººø Nocturne has º{{ e1 }}ºø% bonus Attack Speed.øº

Active:ººøºøºøºøº Nocturne creates a magical barrier for 1.5 seconds, which blocks the next enemy ability.ºøºøºøºøº

ºøºøºøºøºøIf an ability is blocked by the shield, Nocturne's passive Attack Speed bonus doubles for 5 seconds.øºøºøºøºøº

spells.name: ºøUnspeakable Horrorøº
spells.description: ºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøNocturne plants a nightmare into his target's mind, dealing damage each second and fearing the target if they do not get out of range by the end of the duration.øºøºøºøºøºøºøºøº
spells.tooltip: ºøºøºøNocturne plants a nightmare into his target's mind, dealing øºøºøº{{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }})ºø magic damage over øº{{ e3 }}ºøºøºøºøºøº seconds. If Nocturne stays within range of the target for the full duration, the target becomes feared for ºøºøºøºøºøº{{ e2 }}º second(s).º

spells.name: ºParanoiaº
spells.description: ºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøNocturne reduces the sight radius of all enemy champions and removes their ally vision in the process. He can then launch himself at a nearby enemy champion.ºøºøºøºøºøºøºøº
spells.tooltip:
ºøºøºøºøºøNocturne reduces the sight radius of all enemy champions and removes their ally vision for 4 seconds.øºøºøºøºøº

ºøºøºøºøWhile Paranoia is active, Nocturne can launch himself at an enemy champion, dealing ºøºøºøºøº{{ e3 }} (+{{ f1 }})ºø physical damage.º

passive.name: ºUmbra Bladesº
passive.description:
ºøºøºøºøºøºøEvery 10 seconds, Nocturne's next attack strikes surrounding enemies for 120% physical damage and heals himself. ºøºøºøºøºøº

ºøºøºøNocturne's basic attacks reduce this cooldown by 1 second.øºøºøº
